duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely deliver products to customer locations and branch sites within a designated radius, while complying with all DOT regulations.
Load, unload, and stage orders in warehouse or job site environments, and perform additional related duties such as stocking and order entry.
Maintain delivery, truck, and driving records, including obtaining signed delivery receipts, recording tracking information, and completing driver log and vehicle performance forms.
Adhere to safety regulations, perform pre-trip and post-trip vehicle inspections, and report any maintenance issues.
Understand and adhere to FMCSA regulations, and perform additional duties as needed.

education_certification.credential: Safe driving record with no hit & runs or DWI/DUI convictions within the last three years; accidents and/or severe violations in the last year will be reviewed by HR and Management
Prior commercial driving experience and knowledge of DOT & OSHA safety regulations are a plus
Forklift experience is helpful (Other type of truck experience ie: Moffett, etc.)
Ability to lift 50 pounds on a repetitive basis
Able to pass a background check, pre-employment drug test and DOT physical
